t: Prosperity of the One Who Fears the Lord.
Praise*pn the Lord!*s How*ln blessed is the man who fears the Lord,*s Who*ln greatly delights in His commandments.
His*ln descendants will be mighty on earth; The*ln generation of the upright will be blessed.
Wealth*ln and riches are in his house, And*ln his righteousness endures forever.
Light*ln arises in the darkness for the upright; He*iln is*i gracious and compassionate and righteous.
It*ln is well with the man who is gracious and lends; He*ln will maintain his cause in judgment.
For*ln he will never be shaken; The*ln righteous will be remembered forever.
He*ln will not fear evil tidings; His*ln heart is steadfast, trusting in the Lord.*s
His*ln heart is upheld, he will not fear, Until*ln he looks with*i satisfaction*i on his adversaries.
He*ln has given freely to the poor, His*ln righteousness endures forever; His*ln horn will be exalted in honor.
The*ln wicked will see it and be vexed, He*ln will gnash his teeth and melt away; The*ln desire of the wicked will perish.
